review: Works. Love making my dumb TV a smarter TV.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Awesome! Nothing like having this. The ease of use is totally effortless. Just follow the prompt on your Tv for the set up and you are good to go. This has  definitely solved the problem of running a HDMI cable to my TV
author: Joe Clark

review: Chromecast Rocks!!!Pros:Low profile stream stickCan be used with my phone, tablet or computer.Cons:If i had to find one, i guess it doesn't support all media types, but i get around this by using Plex for Android, so it transcodes on the fly.Overall, Chromecast is a great deal at $35 and was a steal at $25 on Black Friday!
author: Riyth

review: These things are awesome. I have one on every TV in the house now.
author: Terry Cone

review: dont spend money of this product, it doesnt work and have many probems to use it

review: I love Chromecast.  It adds a whole new list of entertainment options to our TV.
author: Amazon Customer
